fields.summary: Android: Ti.Gesture.orientation should report device orientation, not screen orientation

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
On iOS, it appears to report the current device orientation, regardless of the screen orientation.

On Android, it appears to return the current screen orientation (same value as Ti.UI.Window.orientation).
fields.summary: Ti.API Ti.Gesture.orientation values inconsistent across platforms
